attributes.action: Re-open Coltishall Airfield as a Civil Airfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently RAF Coltishall was closed. I think that it would be a shame if was to close forever. Lots of people would benefit from re-opening the airfield as Civil Airfield. Coltishall has a lot of history and re-opening it as a Civil Airfield would be a good thing that would boost the local area.
